Chinese Muslims have been in China for the last 1,400 years of continuous
interaction with Chinese society. Dru C.
Gladney writes http://journals.cambridge.org/action/displayAbstract?fromPage=on-
line&aid=164869 Muslims live in every region in China. Various sources estimate different numbers of Muslims in
China. Some sources indicate that about 1â2% of the total population in China
are Muslims.
